text: Victoria Falls is one of Africa's
biggest attractions and for good reason
this place is insanely gorgeous situated
on the border of Zimbabwe and Zambia
along the Zambezi River Victoria Falls
is a massive system of waterfalls that
is the world's largest sheet of falling
water it measures over 5,500 feet wide
by 350 feet tall twice the height of
Niagara Falls the locals call it mostly
a tuna in their local language which
means the smoke that thunders but aside
from the spectacular waterfall the town
of Victoria Falls might just be the most
fun place on earth it's one of the
leading outdoor sports and activity
centres of Africa kind of like
Queenstown meets interlaken but more off
the beaten path ziplining gorge swing
[Applause]
it's extreme sports isn't your thing and
you'd rather go on a safari then you
have the big side animals right on your
doorstep or perhaps you just want to
completely relax in nature I'm staying
at a hotel called elephant camp and look
at this place you can wake up in the
morning by getting a massage whatever
your idea of fun is it's all possible in
this magical place called Victoria Falls
I'm Drew Pinsky and if you like my
videos please click Subscribe and join
me as I plan to visit every country in
the world
